attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dog fighting is still continuing and recent reports have showed an increase in dog fighting within gangs.  We need the governement to give more support to units like the Metropolitan Police status dogs unit and the RSPCA. 

It is owners fault these dogs are aggressive and its the dogs that are being wounded and tortured to death.

Crackdowns on the owners and the breeders with appropriate disciplines needs to happen ASAP

Dogfighting needs to be abolished to help these poor animals. 

please sign x
